name: War of Conquest
description: Share a single vast game world with thousands of other players. In War of Conquest your nation is deep in the fray, carving out a place for itself and fending off usurpers. Forge alliances with other nations to share crucial resources.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 100 MB available space
